      • startProcessing

      • createProcesses

        protected void createProcesses()
        Creates processes using data from file "processes*.csv" and put them to waiting queue 
             Method reads each line of specified file under BaseSchedulingAlgorithm.pathToSourceFile and puts it into BaseSchedulingAlgorithm.waitingQueue.
     First column is id of process, second column is burst time of process.
        Overrides:
        createProcesses in class BaseSchedulingAlgorithm
